metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000409 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A buffer overflow in glibc 2.5 (released on September 29, 2006) and can be triggered through the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable. Please note that many versions of glibc are not vulnerable to this issue if patched for CVE-2017-1000366.

criterions.comment: glibc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.27-3ubuntu1').
